cont.entity_a: Camera arrived ahead of schedule and in good condition. Camera arrived dusty but in good condition.
cont.entity_b: Arrived on time and in perfect condition.

cont.entity_a: Great value for an older model camera.
cont.entity_b: Great deal for the price paid.

cont.entity_a: The camera is great for beginners and takes nice pictures. The camera is easy to use with a variety of settings. The camera is easy to use with intuitive controls. Great camera for beginners with a range of features. Older model but functions well and uses compact flash.
cont.entity_b: Performs well as a backup system.

cont.entity_a: Takes incredible shots. Great picture quality and easy image transfer. Picture quality is great even in automatic mode.
cont.entity_b: Produces sharp prints with a good lens. Excellent low ISO performance and outstanding images.

cont.entity_a: The camera was in bad condition, missing settings indicator and side cover. Some items missing from the package. Received incomplete order with missing items.
cont.entity_b: The camera body is like new and works flawlessly. Heavy but durable.

cont.entity_a: Some issues with focus, flash, and a constant busy signal. Auto-focus struggles and build quality is weak. The camera takes rapid sequence photos without lag.
Manual and editing software are available online. Manual is overwhelming at first but becomes easier.
Seller included extra battery and memory card.

cont.entity_b: Review screen is small and picture quality not as good as newer models.
Confusion about high price on Amazon compared to eBay.
